# Anticoagulation



## Bleeding {#sec-ecmobleeding}

Bleeding is a common and severe complication of ECMO support. Initial management should involve:

* Cease anticoagulation\
Resume when bleeding has ceased for 12-24 hours
* Replace clotting factors
    * Fibrinogen >1.5g/dL
    * Platelets >80
    * INR <1.3
    

For bleeding refractory to the above therapies, consider:
    
:::column-margin
Avoid protamine in patients with heparin-bonded circuits due to risk of circuit thrombosis.
:::       
    
* Fibrinolytic
* Factor VIIa
* Interventional radiology
* Surgical
